parallelization.approach: Divide by module type (security, business logic, UI)

infrastructureFixes.name: Phase 0: Infrastructure Fixes
tasks: Resolve memory leak issues in tests

performance.focus: Load, stress, and response time testing

cicd.coverageGates: Enforce minimum 95% coverage for new code
cicd.automatedTesting: Run all test categories on PR and merge

testGeneration.templates: Create test templates for common patterns
testGeneration.scaffolding: Auto-generate test skeletons for new modules
testGeneration.mocking: Standardize mocking patterns across test suites

reporting.trends: Track coverage trends and identify regressions
reporting.alerts: Notify on coverage drops or test failures
